Location Address: 4366 South Main St. Los Angeles, CA
Services: John Muir Charter School is a statewide WASC accredited high school diploma program that serves youth 16-24 that have been pushed out of the traditional education system. We offer a rigorous academic program with full-time accredited teachers and academic tutors in tandem with career and college readiness programs at our school sites.
Eligibility: Ages 16-25 and in need of a high-school diploma
How BestÂ to Access: Call 213.744.2254 to schedule an appointment. Bring the following documents: picture ID, birth certificate, social security, proof of address and high school transcripts. However, the documents should not be a barrier to enrollment.
